fields.name: Express Exterior Wash
fields.description: A quick exterior wash service that includes a thorough hand wash, wheel cleaning, and tire shine. Perfect for maintaining your car's appearance between major cleanings.

fields.name: Basic Interior Clean
fields.description: Complete interior vacuum service including seats, carpets, and boot. Includes dashboard and console cleaning with anti-bacterial treatment.

fields.name: Standard Valet Package
fields.description: Our comprehensive valeting package includes both exterior wash and interior cleaning. Perfect for regular maintenance of your vehicle.

fields.name: Weekend Special
fields.description: Book our Standard Valet Package for the weekend and receive a 15% discount. Available Friday through Sunday only.

fields.name: Basic Ceramic Coating
fields.description: Entry level ceramic coating application that provides up to 6 months of protection against environmental contaminants, UV rays, and light scratches.

fields.name: Front-End Paint Protection Film
fields.description: Protect the most vulnerable areas of your vehicle with our premium paint protection film. Includes application on the bonnet, front bumper, and wing mirrors.

fields.name: Corporate Fleet Basic Package
fields.description: Designed for businesses with multiple vehicles. This package includes exterior wash and basic interior cleaning for a fleet of up to 5 vehicles.

fields.name: €50 Gift Voucher
fields.description: Give the gift of a pristine vehicle! This €50 gift voucher can be applied to any of our mobile car valeting services. Valid for 12 months from purchase date.

fields.name: €100 Gift Voucher
fields.description: Perfect gift for car enthusiasts! This €100 gift voucher can be used toward any of our premium detailing services. Valid for 12 months from purchase date.
